content.rendered:
Directed by Chloe Okuno

Written by Zack Ford. Chloe Okuno

Star Maika Monroe(Julia). Karl Glusman(Francis). Burn Gorman(Watcher / Weber). Tudor Petrut(Taxi Driver). Gabriela Butuc(Flavia). Madalina Anea(Irina). Cristina Deleanu(Eleonora). Bogdan Farcas(Neighbor). Daniel Nuta(Cristian). Ioana Abur(Simion’s Wife). Flaviu Crisan(Simion). Stefan Iancu(Sebastian). Florian Ghimpu(Officer Radu). Lucian Ionescu(Maintenance Worker). Radu Bunescu(Ticket Taker). Alexandru Ion(Nicolae). Ciprian Chiriches(Waiter). Ionut Grama(Club Employee). Simona Patruleasa(Female News Anchor). Ioana Hirica(Flower Vendor). Alice Cora Mihalache(Cashier). Aida Economu(Lucia). Andreea Sovan(Female Victim). Adrian Radulescu(Kiosk Seller). Petre Moraru(Old Man). Marius Cobzariu(Bouncer). Otilia Panainte(Onlooker Woman). Ruslan Vieru(Weber’s Double #1). Philippe Nevo(Weber’s Double #2). Mircea Bujoreanu(Homeless Man). Ioana Farcas(Wife). Cosmina-Georgiana Stefanoaia(Dancer #1). Florina-Izabela Stancu(Dancer #2). Georgiana-Ioana Radu(Dancer #3). Victor Neagu(Teenager Smoking). Izabela Popescu(Young Couple #1). Edoard Leroy(Young Couple #2). Marian Iordachescu(Drunkman). Nucu Stangaciu(Movie Goer Grumbling). Daniela Druga(Elderly Woman). Coca Zibilianu(Old Woman). Nicolae Ivanescu(Old Husband). Alin Rosu(TV Reporter). Marin Gheorghe(Aetheneum Caretaker). Ciubuciu Bogdan Alexandru(Young Man (as Bogdan-Alexandru Ciubuciu)). Vlad Balan(Teenager). Corina Ciontu(Woman Couple #1). Bogdan Mohora(Policeman #1). Iulian Nica(Policeman #2 (as Nica Iulian)). Eduard-Florin Lazar(Policeman #3). Catalin Cnej(Policeman #4). Nicusor Gaureanu(Paramedic #1). Paul Dumitrescu(Paramedic #2). Camelia Stanescu(Onlooker). Daniel Dobre(Onlooker). Madalina Grosu(Onlooker). Bruno Neagu(Onlooker). Petre Lica(Onlooker). Gregory Chater(Detective). Livia Maria Sîrbu(Little Girl). James Ketteridge(Kyle (uncredited))

Language English. Romanian

Producers Gabi Antal. Derek Dauchy. John Finemore. Zack Ford. James Hoppe. Aaron Kaplan. Roy Lee. Stuart Manashil. Mason Novick. Sean Perrone. Costin Rantes. Ben Ross. Steven Schneider. Rami Yasin

Production Imagenation Abu Dhabi FZ. Lost City
